item.title: Learning Experience
item.description: My Learning Journey as a Beginner Web Developer I’ve always been interested in computers and technology, so when I decided to learn web development, I was excited to get started. I knew that HTML and CSS were the foundation of web development, so I started by learning those languages. At first, it was difficult. I had to learn a lot of new concepts, and I wasn’t sure where to start. I also had some difficulties with electricity and network connections.
